title: Clean water for children
description: Growing up in a clean and safe environment is every child’s right. Access to clean water, basic toilets, and good hygiene practices not only keeps children thriving, but also gives them a healthier start in life.When children don’t have access to clean water, it affects their health, nutrition, education and learning abilities, thus impacting many aspects of their lives.

title: Good education
description: There are many things that can be done to ensure that all people have access to a good education. Governments can invest in public schools, provide financial assistance to students, and make sure that all schools have qualified teachers and resources. Families can support their children's education by creating a learning environment at home and helping them with their schoolwork. Teachers can create a positive and supportive learning environment for their students and challenge them to reach their full potential.

title: Used Clothing Drive
description: Over 660,000 people are affected by the devastation. When an emergency like this strikes, every minute counts, and your donation can make all the difference. We need your help to reach more children and families in need.UNICEF is on the ground, mobilizing essential life-saving supplies. So far we have delivered vital medical supplies for 10,000 people, Hygiene kits for 1,100 individuals, and essential clothing kits for 500 children. But the need is immense. Donate generously to help UNICEF deliver urgent and life-saving aid. Give now!

title: Better Food for Everyone
description: Today, 200 million children’s lives are at risk because they are malnourished. We give our everything to urgently reach these children, before it’s too late. Every life-saving box we deliver, is more than just food. It’s a future.
